channel.title: How do i make my server's own ip?
channel.description:
I WANNA MAKE MY SERVER'S IP
hasanscape.no-ip.biz
or
hasanscape.no-ip.org
How do i do this??
If you help you get rep++

item.title: How do i make my server's own ip?
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

No-ip.com
go into client.java search 127.0.0.1
replace all the “127.0.0.1” with your ip, hopefully this shud work, as i tried and it enables my server to run off that ip.
hpe this helped

Read full topic

item.source: How do i make my server's own ip?

item.title: How do i make my server's own ip?
item.dc:creator: @Jddogg9 Jddogg9
item.description:
@Jddogg9 wrote:

[quote=“Mopar2405, post:2, topic:291276”]I am sure u registered on no-ip duc! So on your no-ip duc program hit to add or remove hosts click here then it will take you to a page on no-ip duc hit add host

BUT ONLY CHANGE HOSTNAME AND NOTHING ELSE OR IT WONT WORK!

Tell me if it worked! I know it will 100%[/quote]

make an account at…

no-ip.com

go to “create a new host”

type in the ip address you want (as mopar2405 said… “only change hostname”)

save…

then click on downloads tab…

download no-ip, check the ip you made and keep it checked then…

RUN YOUR SERVER.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my server's own ip?

item.title: How do i make my server's own ip?
item.dc:creator: @Mopar2405 Mopar2405
item.description:
@Mopar2405 wrote:

I am sure u registered on no-ip duc! So on your no-ip duc program hit to add or remove hosts click here then it will take you to a page on no-ip duc hit add host

BUT ONLY CHANGE HOSTNAME AND NOTHING ELSE OR IT WONT WORK!

Tell me if it worked! I know it will 100%

Read full topic
